ARABIC: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Travel about the earth and see the final fate of the deniers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Travel in the land and see what happened to those who disbelieved."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: 'Go about journeying the earth, and behold the end of those who gave the lie (to the Truth).'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them to travel in the land and see what happened to those who rejected the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Travel in the land, and see what sort of fate befell those who denied.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Travel in the land and see what was the end of those who rejected truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Travel in the land, then see what was the end of the rejecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Journey in the land, then behold how was the end of them that cried lies.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto the disbelievers): Travel in the land, and see the nature of the consequence for the rejecters!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Travel about the land and see what was the end of the deniers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: go about in the earth and then see what wise hath been the end of the beliers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Travel over the land, and then observe how was the fate of the deniers.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Travel through the earth and see what was the end of those who rejected Truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Travel in the land and see what was the end of those who rejected truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Travel the land and see what was the fate of those who belied'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Travel the earth and observe the final fate of the deniers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:11] Say, to them: ‘Travel in the land, and see the nature of the consequence for the deniers’, of the messengers, how they were destroyed through chastisement; perhaps they will take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Travel in the land, and see) and reflect upon (the nature of the consequence for the rejecters!) what happened to those who denied Allah and His messengers.
